biotools.summary: Server which analyzes microarray and promoter sequence data associated with a response to a specific stimulus.  After analysis a potential transcriptional regulatory network is created.  CARRIE also determines which transcription factors were likely involved in regulation and which genes they regulated.

bioschemas.name: CARRIE
